SET NOCOUNT ON /************************************************************************/ /* 광고즐겨찾기테이블 - T_AD_FAVORITE 조회 - GetAdFavoriteList SELECT QUERY */ /************************************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @PAGE INT = {0}, @PAGE_COUNT INT = {1} ,@FR_DATE DATETIME = '{2} 00:00:00', @TO_DATE DATETIME = '{3} 23:59:59.999' ; WITH T_TABLE AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.IDX DESC) AS SEQ , A.IDX , A.FAV_TYPE , B.NAME AS FAV_TYPE_NAME , A.AD_CODE , ISNULL(D.TITLE,'') AS AD_TITLE , A.DEVICE_CODE , ISNULL(E.DEVICE_NAME,'') AS DEVICE_NAME , A.DEVICE_SEQ , A.MOBILE , A.SNS_TYPE , C.NAME AS SNS_TYPE_NAME , A.EMAIL , A.REMARK , A.USER_IP , A.UPDATE_DATE , A.CNT FROM T_AD_FAVORITE A INNER JOIN T_COMMON B ON B.MAIN_CODE = 'L003' AND B.SUB_CODE = A.FAV_TYPE LEFT JOIN T_COMMON C ON C.MAIN_CODE = 'L004' AND C.SUB_CODE = A.SNS_TYPE LEFT JOIN T_AD D ON A.AD_CODE = D.AD_CODE LEFT JOIN T_DEVICE E ON A.DEVICE_CODE = E.DEVICE_CODE WHERE A.UPDATE_DATE >= @FR_DATE AND B.UPDATE_DATE <= @TO_DATE #[IDX] #[FAV_TYPE] #[AD_CODE] #[DEVICE_CODE] #[DEVICE_SEQ] #[MOBILE] #[SNS_TYPE] #[EMAIL] #[USER_IP] #[AD_TITLE] #[DEVICE_NAME] ) SELECT * , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_TABLE) TOTAL_ROWCOUNT FROM T_TABLE WHERE SEQ > ((@PAGE - 1) * @PAGE_COUNT) AND SEQ <= (@PAGE * @PAGE_COUNT)
SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /********************************************************/ /* 광고즐겨찾기테이블 - T_AD_FAVORITE 저장 - SAVE QUERY */ /********************************************************/ DECLARE @IDX BIGINT = N'{0}' , @FAV_TYPE INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{1}') = 1 THEN '{1}' ELSE '0' END ) , @AD_CODE BIGINT = CONVERT(BIGINT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{2}') = 1 THEN '{2}' ELSE NULL END ) , @DEVICE_CODE BIGINT = CONVERT(BIGINT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{3}') = 1 THEN '{3}' ELSE NULL END ) , @DEVICE_SEQ INT = CONVERT(BIGINT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{4}') = 1 THEN '{4}' ELSE NULL END ) , @MOBILE VARCHAR(20) = N'{5}' , @SNS_TYPE INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{6}') = 1 THEN '{6}' ELSE NULL END ) , @EMAIL VARCHAR(30) = N'{7}' , @USER_IP VARCHAR(50) = N'{8}' , @REMARK NVARCHAR(200) = N'{9}' , @UPDATE_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
SET @MOBILE = REPLACE(@MOBILE, '-','') IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM T_AD_FAVORITE WHERE MOBILE = @MOBILE AND EMAIL = @EMAIL AND ISNULL(AD_CODE,0) = ISNULL(@AD_CODE,0) AND ISNULL(DEVICE_CODE,0) = ISNULL(@DEVICE_CODE,0) AND ISNULL(DEVICE_SEQ,0) = ISNULL(@DEVICE_SEQ,0) AND USER_IP = @USER_IP AND ISNULL(SNS_TYPE,0) = ISNULL(@SNS_TYPE,0) ) BEGIN
UPDATE T_AD_FAVORITE SET CNT = ISNULL(CNT,1) + 1 WHERE MOBILE = @MOBILE AND EMAIL = @EMAIL AND ISNULL(AD_CODE,0) = ISNULL(@AD_CODE,0) AND ISNULL(DEVICE_CODE,0) = ISNULL(@DEVICE_CODE,0) AND ISNULL(DEVICE_SEQ,0) = ISNULL(@DEVICE_SEQ,0) AND USER_IP = @USER_IP AND ISNULL(SNS_TYPE,0) = ISNULL(@SNS_TYPE,0)
GOTO EXCEPTION END
UPDATE A SET FAV_TYPE = @FAV_TYPE , AD_CODE = @AD_CODE , DEVICE_CODE = @DEVICE_CODE , DEVICE_SEQ = @DEVICE_SEQ , MOBILE = @MOBILE , SNS_TYPE = @SNS_TYPE , EMAIL = @EMAIL , USER_IP = @USER_IP , REMARK = @REMARK , UPDATE_DATE = @UPDATE_DATE FROM T_AD_FAVORITE A WHERE IDX= @IDX IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO T_AD_FAVORITE ( FAV_TYPE , AD_CODE , DEVICE_CODE , DEVICE_SEQ , MOBILE , SNS_TYPE , EMAIL , USER_IP , REMARK , UPDATE_DATE ) SELECT @FAV_TYPE , @AD_CODE , @DEVICE_CODE , @DEVICE_SEQ , @MOBILE , @SNS_TYPE , @EMAIL , @USER_IP , @REMARK , @UPDATE_DATE END
EXCEPTION: SET NOCOUNT OFF
